snippet: The National Institutes of Health said on Friday that it had found a nearly century-old container of improperly stored ricin and other dangerous pathogens in one of its labs.
abstract: National Institutes of Health says it has uncovered nearly century-old container of ricin and handful of other forgotten samples of dangerous pathogens as it searched its laboratories for improperly stored hazardous materials; agency began intensive investigation following July discovery of smallpox vials dating to 1950s.
lead_paragraph: The National Institutes of Health said on Friday that it had found a nearly century-old container of improperly stored ricin and other dangerous pathogens in one of its labs.

headline.main: N.I.H. Lab Search Uncovers Forgotten Ricin
headline.print_headline: N.I.H. Lab Search Uncovers Forgotten Ricin
